title: Nick Thomas-Symonds – 2021 Comments on Priti Patel Refusing to Appear in Commons
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Nick Thomas-Symonds, the Shadow Home Secretary, on 18 January 2021.
content:
It’s shameful – and, frankly, embarrassing – for the Home Secretary not to come to Parliament today.
